product.title: The Lion King | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Based on one of the most popular Disney movies of all time, this favorite read-along book tells the life story of Simba, a young lion who faces life-changing challenges and adventures as he grows up. His father, King Mufasa, teaches Simba about the delicate balance of the animal kingdom, but the whole family is ultimately endangered by the evil intentions of the jealous Scar, Mufasa’s brother. Through a series of heartbreaking and heroic adventures, Simba realizes the importance of loyalty, courage, love and—perhaps most important of all—the Circle of Life.

Tie-in Activity: Head out for a walk and encourage your child to look for signs of the Circle of Life in his own neighborhood, whether it’s a bird swooping down to feast on a worm or a spider trapping a fly in its web.
